* Added VoiceOver support, Apple's assistive technology for the visually impaired. If you or anyone you know relies on VoiceOver, we'd love to hear how you're using the app. Please email us at help@pbs.org. Your feedback helps us improve our apps.
* Added AirPlay support for iOS 11 and higher.

* Something pinkamazing is coming to PBS KIDS Video. Join Pinkalicious & Peterrific as they explore the arts in the brand new series premiering February 19th!
